title: Shortest Bridge
content: In a given 2D binary array , there are two islands. (An island is a 4-directionally connected group of 1s not connected to any other 1s.) Now, we may change 0s to 1s so as to connect the two islands together to form 1 island. Return the smallest number of 0s that must be flipped. (It is guaranteed that the answer is at least 1.) or
